passage_text: Salary Information. While salary data specific to NASCAR technicians isn't available, automobile service technicians and mechanics for all industries made around $39,450 on average annually, according to the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) in May 2013 (www.bls.gov).

Average Nascar Tech Salaries. The average salary for nascar tech jobs is $74,000. Average nascar tech salaries can vary greatly due to company, location, industry, experience and benefits. This salary was calculated using the average salary for all jobs with the term nascar tech anywhere in the job listing.

Average base salary for a driver is in the $1,500,000 range. Typically drivers also receive 40%-50% of their race winnings.
